creator: ILMILI
descriptionHtml:
Graph Messenger is an UNOFFICIAL messaging app that uses Telegram's API and add new features like real multi account system, download manager and time line.

It has all Telegram benefits and new fantastic features.

Features:
+Real multi account system, unlimited account login and 100 simultaneous active account.
+Download Manager, manage and schedule your downloads with a multi queue download manager.
+Support any type of theme, telegram theme or Plus theme or Mobogram theme.
+Voice changer, change your voice when send voice messages.
+Hidden section, hide your chats and contacts and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Lock chats, lock your chats and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Send Drawing, draw anything you like and send as message.
+Time Line, show all channels messages in one page.
+Favorite Messages, add messages to favorite messages and show them in separate page.
+Auto answer machine, send auto message to contact when you can't answer.
+Short Messages, When the message is long it shows it short.
+Separate channels, groups, users,... in chats list.
+Favorite chats, add chats to favorite chats and show them in separate list.
+Categorize chats list, create categories and add chats to them.
+File manager, show all chats media in one page.
+Contact changes, can show contact changes like change name, avatar and phone in one page.
+Special contact, notify you when your special contact is online.
+Can edit and customize main menu.
+Can change screen light and color filter.
+Telegraph settings, you can customize your telegraph app in telegraph settings.
+Professional proxy settings, Multi delete, share and copy. Sort by ping time.
+Smart connect to proxy by ping time.
+Import proxies from file and clipboard. export proxies to file.
+...
and other features.

title: Graph Messenger

creator: ILMILI
descriptionHtml:
Graph Messenger is an UNOFFICIAL messaging app that uses Telegram's API and add new features like real multi account system, download manager and time line.

It has all Telegram benefits and new fantastic features.

Features:
+Real multi account system, unlimited account login and 100 simultaneous active account.
+Download Manager, manage and schedule your downloads with a multi queue download manager.
+Support any type of theme, telegram theme or Plus theme or Mobo theme.
+Voice changer, change your voice when send voice messages.
+Hidden section, hide your chats and contacts and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Lock chats, lock your chats and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Send Drawing, draw anything you like and send as message.
+Time Line, show all channels messages in one page.
+Favorite Messages, add messages to favorite messages and show them in separate page.
+Auto answer machine, send auto message to contact when you can't answer.
+Short Messages, When the message is long it shows it short.
+Separate channels, groups, users,... in chats list.
+Favorite chats, add chats to favorite chats and show them in separate list.
+Categorize chats list, create categories and add chats to them.
+File manager, show all chats media in one page.
+Contact changes, can show contact changes like change name, avatar and phone in one page.
+Special contact, notify you when your special contact is online.
+Can edit and customize main menu.
+Can change screen light and color filter.
+Telegraph settings, you can customize your telegraph app in telegraph settings.
+Professional proxy settings, Multi delete, share and copy. Sort by ping time.
+Smart connect to proxy by ping time.
+Import proxies from file and clipboard. export proxies to file.
+...
and other features.

It has all Telegram benefits and new fantastic features.

Features:
+Real multi account system, unlimited account login and 100 simultaneous active account.
+Download Manager, manage and schedule your downloads with a multi queue download manager.
+Support any type of theme, telegram theme or Plus theme or Mobo theme.
+Voice changer, change your voice when send voice messages.
+Hidden section, hide your chats and contacts and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Lock chats, lock your chats and set password or pattern lock for them.
+Send Drawing, draw anything you like and send as message.
+Time Line, show all channels messages in one page.
+Favorite Messages, add messages to favorite messages and show them in separate page.
+Auto answer machine, send auto message to contact when you can't answer.
+Short Messages, When the message is long it shows it short.
+Separate channels, groups, users,... in chats list.
+Favorite chats, add chats to favorite chats and show them in separate list.
+Categorize chats list, create categories and add chats to them.
+File manager, show all chats media in one page.
+Contact changes, can show contact changes like change name, avatar and phone in one page.
+Special contact, notify you when your special contact is online.
+Can edit and customize main menu.
+Can change screen light and color filter.
+Telegraph settings, you can customize your telegraph app in telegraph settings.
+Professional proxy settings, Multi delete, share and copy. Sort by ping time.
+Smart connect to proxy by ping time.
+Import proxies from file and clipboard. export proxies to file.
+...
and other features.

title:
Graph Messenger
T11.1.3 - P11.13.0

creator: Databite
descriptionHtml:
Graph Messenger is an advanced messaging app built using Telegram's API, offering all the benefits of Telegram plus innovative features such as:

🚩Multi-account management: Easily switch between unlimited accounts without logging out.
🚩Download manager: Manage and organize your downloads efficiently.
🚩Timeline: View and manage messages from different chats in a consolidated timeline.
🚩Hidden Section: Hides chats and contacts, with the option to set password or pattern locks for additional privacy.
🚩Auto Answer Machine: Automatically sends pre-set messages to contacts when you're unable to respond, acting as an auto-reply feature.


As an UNOFFICIAL app, it provides users with additional flexibility and customization options. Enjoy all the benefits of Telegram—speed, security, cloud-based storage—with the added power of new tools that enhance your messaging experience, including voice and video call support.

🏅Key Features:

▪️Full Telegram API integration
▪️Advanced multi-account system
▪️Built-in download manager
▪️Exclusive timeline view for your chats
▪️Secure, fast, and reliable


🏅Other comprehensive features:

▪️Voice Changer: Modify your voice when sending voice messages for fun or privacy.
▪️Customizable Interface: Personalize your app with various themes, colors, and font options to match your style.
▪️Hidden Chats: Keep certain chats private and hidden with password protection.
▪️Proxy Support: Easily connect via proxies for enhanced privacy and bypassing restrictions.
▪️Send Drawing: Draw anything you like and send as message or sticker.
▪️Advanced Notifications: Customize notifications for specific chats or channels, including sounds and vibration patterns.
▪️ID Finder: Quickly find user profiles using their unique Telegram ID.
▪️Tabs & Folders: Organize your chats into custom folders or tabs for better navigation.
▪️Auto-Reply: Set automated responses for incoming messages when you're away or busy.
▪️Bulk Message Deletion: Clear large numbers of messages quickly from any chat.
▪️Message Scheduling: Schedule messages to be sent at specific times to any contact or group.
▪️Advanced Media Sharing: Share large files, documents, or media without quality loss.
▪️Contact changes: can show contact changes like change name, avatar and phone in one page.
▪️Favorite Messages: Add messages to favorite messages and show them in separate page.
▪️Hashtags+ : A place to track your favorite hashtags in the public posts.
▪️Customizable Menu Items: Can edit and customize main menu.
▪️Story: Post stories with animated background.
▪️Collapse long messages : When the message is long, it can be shortened.
▪️Chat Bar: Ability to open other recent chats directly from the chat page.
▪️Special contact: Notify you when your special contact is online.
▪️Favorite Emojies: You can touch and add emojies to your favorite tab.

T11.5.3 - P11.16.3

creator: Databite
descriptionHtml:
Graph Messenger is an advanced messaging app built using Telegram's API, offering all the benefits of Telegram plus innovative features such as:

🚩Multi-account management: Easily switch between unlimited accounts without logging out.
🚩Download manager: Manage and organize your downloads efficiently.
🚩Timeline: View and manage messages from different chats in a consolidated timeline.
🚩Hidden Section: Hides chats and contacts, with the option to set password or pattern locks for additional privacy.
🚩Auto Answer Machine: Automatically sends pre-set messages to contacts when you're unable to respond, acting as an auto-reply feature.


As an UNOFFICIAL app, it provides users with additional flexibility and customization options. Enjoy all the benefits of Telegram—speed, security, cloud-based storage—with the added power of new tools that enhance your messaging experience, including voice and video call support.

🏅Key Features:

▪️Full Telegram API integration
▪️Advanced multi-account system
▪️Built-in download manager
▪️Exclusive timeline view for your chats
▪️Secure, fast, and reliable


🏅Other comprehensive features:

▪️Voice Changer: Modify your voice when sending voice messages for fun or privacy.
▪️Special Forward: Ability to edit messages before forwarding them. (Remove & Replace links, Replace texts, Rearrange messages,...)
▪️Customizable Interface: Personalize your app with various themes, colors, and font options to match your style.
▪️Bot Account Login: login as bot account with the token you got from BotFather
▪️Hidden Chats: Keep certain chats private and hidden with password protection.
▪️Proxy Support: Easily connect via proxies for enhanced privacy and bypassing restrictions.
▪️Send Drawing: Draw anything you like and send as message or sticker.
▪️Advanced Notifications: Customize notifications for specific chats or channels, including sounds and vibration patterns.
▪️ID Finder: Quickly find user profiles using their unique Telegram ID.
▪️Tabs & Folders: Organize your chats into custom folders or tabs for better navigation.
▪️Auto-Reply: Set automated responses for incoming messages when you're away or busy.
▪️Bulk Message Deletion: Clear large numbers of messages quickly from any chat.
▪️Message Scheduling: Schedule messages to be sent at specific times to any contact or group.
▪️Advanced Media Sharing: Share large files, documents, or media without quality loss.
▪️Contact changes: can show contact changes like change name, avatar and phone in one page.
▪️Favorite Messages: Add messages to favorite messages and show them in separate page.
▪️Hashtags+ : A place to track your favorite hashtags in the public posts.
▪️Customizable Menu Items: Can edit and customize main menu.
▪️Story: Post stories with animated background.
▪️Collapse long messages : When the message is long, it can be shortened.
▪️Chat Bar: Ability to open other recent chats directly from the chat page.
▪️Special contact: Notify you when your special contact is online.
▪️Favorite Emojies: You can touch and add emojies to your favorite tab.
